review: Took three days, after installing it into an hdmi port for updates to download. Then when I launched it and viewed a YouTube selection, everything was fine. HOWEVER, I could not access other inputs (tv, dvd player) on my tv screen while using Chromecast. I had to shut down Chromecast, remove the hdmi connection and then unplug my tv so that the tv could reboot and restore it to the point where I could select other inputs. Also, Chromecast never showed up as an available input. Confusing, to say the leas
